title: Implementation details of `nx release publish`
description: DO NOT INVOKE DIRECTLY WITH `nx run`. Use `nx release publish` instead.

packageRoot.description: The root directory of the directory (containing a manifest file at its root) to publish. Defaults to the project root.

registry.description: The registry to publish the package to.

tag.description: The distribution tag to apply to the published package.

dryRun.description: Whether to run the command without actually publishing the package to the registry.
